item.description:
What happened?

During the game, I keep getting disconnected and reconnected. This happens a three to four times a match, typically. I’ve missed entire rounds because of this, at times.

What was SUPPOSED to happen?

Staying connected.

Steps to reproduce:

I’m not sure how to reproduce this but it happens every game.

Comments:

Sometimes during a reconnect, I can not view the logs of people or deathnotes unless they die after I reconnect. The reconnect takes up to 60-80 seconds at a time. I can’t upload my logs since I’m a new user? Any help would be greatly appreciated.
